titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Elphinstone and Lawrence Nilson, aboard the Revengeat sea, to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green

mods.abstract: The letter expresses hope that the Caun [Karim Khan] will assist in the attack on Carrack [Kharg] as soon as possible. Also informs that the company surgeon, Mr Birch, and the sick and wounded are proceeding to Bushire. Enclosed is a copy of a letter to the Agency at Basra, also from Charles Elphinstone and Lawrence Nilson.Enclosed letter (dated 21 May 1768): To Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]. The letter gives a detailed account of the first attack on the Island of Carrack [Kharg]. The letter is certified a true copy by the signature of J. Y. Botham, secretary to the expedition.
